strokes.description: Adding playful wiggly lines to enhance the existing bubbles, creating a dancing pattern that weaves between the colorful circles

parsed_instruction.reasoning: The existing composition features soft, overlapping pastel circles that create a dreamy, lighthearted atmosphere. The wiggly line adds a playful, whimsical element that complements the gentle color palette and circular forms. The slow drawing speed (t=4) ensures the wiggle stroke flows smoothly and elegantly through the composition, enhancing the overall playful and carefree mood.
